review: This book is a comprehensive guide to web development with Rails. It covers all the essential concepts and provides practical examples. Highly recommended!
A good introduction to Flask and web development in Python. The examples are clear, and the author explains things well.

bookName: Agile web development with rails: a Pragmatic guide
review: This book is a must-have for anyone learning Rails. It's well-written and covers everything you need to know to build web applications with Rails.
The book is decent, but it could use some better editing. There are typos and grammatical errors throughout. The content is useful, though.

bookName: Alex Homer, ASP.NET 2.0 Visual Web Developer 2005
review: A good starting point for learning ASP.NET. The examples are helpful, and it covers the basics well.
I found this book very informative. It's a great resource for those looking to work with PHP and Oracle. The integration examples were helpful.

bookName: WordPress for Web Developers: An Introduction for Web Professionals
review: As a web developer, this book provided valuable insights into using WordPress for more professional projects. Highly recommended for those new to WordPress.
The book gives an introduction to MODx, but it's somewhat outdated in terminology. It could benefit from a more up-to-date edition.
This book does a great job of introducing Grok and test-driven development. It's a valuable resource for web developers.
An excellent book for JavaScript developers looking to deepen their knowledge. It covers important topics in great detail.
